amendment.description: To provide appropriations to expedite fiber research on industrial hemp and expand cereal research into mycotoxin risk mitigation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3418 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3418 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3418 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3418 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
